name: Political Nonsense 2016
description:
Political Nonsense! How well do you know your 2016 U.S. Presidential candidates.

In this game you will be given ten random quotes or facts about the U.S. 2016 Presidential candidates.   Answer in the first 5 seconds for a chance at maximum points (1000). After that, you'll have another 10 seconds for a chance to score partial points.

To answer, tap the candidate you think is correct. If you're not sure of the answer, you get 1/2 points by choosing the correct party - Democratic Donkey or Republican Elephant.

Good luck and lets see if your know your candidates and how close you can get to 10,000 points.
